pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["安同 OS 是一个由",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://aosc.io","rel":"nofollow","children":"安同开源社区"}],"开发的半滚动 Linux 发行版，支持多种处理器架构。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"工具修改","children":"工具修改"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请使用以下命令交互式开启/关闭镜像源，输入镜像源名称并使用空格启用/禁用镜像源（请注意：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"oma mirror"}]," 允许指定多个镜像源，请注意禁用不需要使用的镜像源）："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}oma mirror","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["关于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"oma mirror"}]," 的更多详细命令和用法，请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/AOSC-Dev/oma?tab=readme-ov-file#command-reference","rel":"nofollow","children":"oma 的 GitHub 页面"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手动修改不推荐","children":"手动修改（不推荐）"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["安同 OS 推荐使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"oma"}]," 完成对软件源配置的修改，不推荐手动编辑配置文件。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如确实有相关需求，请按下例编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}]," 的内容："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debs stable main","codeLanguage":"properties"}]]}]

meta.title: 安同 OS 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
